name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifiers assigned to this condition by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Business identifiers assigned to this condition by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this condition by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $clinicalStatus
desc: Returns: The clinical status of the condition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The clinical status of the condition.

name: $verificationStatus
desc: Returns: The verification status to support the clinical status of the condition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The verification status to support the clinical status of the condition.

name: $category
desc: Returns: A category assigned to the condition.

name: $addcategory
desc: A category assigned to the condition.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A category assigned to the condition.

name: $severity
desc: Returns: A subjective assessment of the severity of the condition as evaluated by the clinician.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A subjective assessment of the severity of the condition as evaluated by the clinician.

name: $code
desc: Returns: Identification of the condition, problem or diagnosis.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identification of the condition, problem or diagnosis.

name: $bodySite
desc: Returns: The anatomical location where this condition manifests itself.

name: $addbodySite
desc: The anatomical location where this condition manifests itself.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The anatomical location where this condition manifests itself.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: Indicates the patient or group who the condition record is associated with.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the patient or group who the condition record is associated with.

name: $encounter
desc: Returns: The Encounter during which this Condition was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The Encounter during which this Condition was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

name: $recordedDate
desc: Returns: The recordedDate represents when this particular Condition record was created in the system, which is often a system-generated date.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The recordedDate represents when this particular Condition record was created in the system, which is often a system-generated date.

name: $recorder
desc: Returns: Individual who recorded the record and takes responsibility for its content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Individual who recorded the record and takes responsibility for its content.

name: $asserter
desc: Returns: Individual who is making the condition statement.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Individual who is making the condition statement.

name: $stage
desc: Returns: Clinical stage or grade of a condition. May include formal severity assessments.

name: $addstage
desc: Clinical stage or grade of a condition. May include formal severity assessments.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Clinical stage or grade of a condition. May include formal severity assessments.

name: $evidence
desc: Returns: Supporting evidence / manifestations that are the basis of the Condition's verification status, such as evidence that confirmed or refuted the condition.

name: $addevidence
desc: Supporting evidence / manifestations that are the basis of the Condition's verification status, such as evidence that confirmed or refuted the condition.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Supporting evidence / manifestations that are the basis of the Condition's verification status, such as evidence that confirmed or refuted the condition.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Additional information about the Condition. This is a general notes/comments entry  for description of the Condition, its diagnosis and prognosis.

name: $addnote
desc: Additional information about the Condition. This is a general notes/comments entry  for description of the Condition, its diagnosis and prognosis.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Additional information about the Condition. This is a general notes/comments entry  for description of the Condition, its diagnosis and prognosis.
